name: Thanos Athanasiadis
story: Thanos Athanasiadis was born in Athens, Greece and grew up in a small village outside the city. He joined the military at 18 and has since become a highly skilled marksman. Thanos is known for his analytical and strategic thinking, which makes him a valuable asset to his team. He is married to his childhood sweetheart, Sofia, and they have two children together.
